name: ColorPhoenix
description:
Spread your wings and colors!

Whoever spreads their color the furthest wins!

Low pass flybys will color in the terrain.
You can steal points from other players by painting over their stuff.
Buildings and sky-islands give more points.
Crashing into obstacles will cost points.

Controls:

Left Stick XYawLeft/RightLeft Stick YPitchUp/DownRight Stick XRollLeft/RightLeft Bumper Map ViewStartPause MenuA (Xbox)SubmitB (Xbox)Cancel

Enjoy!
